name: I PHONE x
description: The iPhone X has an OLED display which measures 5.8 inches diagonally. Apple calls this a Super Retina Display. It has a contrast ratio (the difference between the brightest a screen can be, and the darkest) of 1,000,000:1. It is also very sharp, with a resolution of 2436-by-1125. It is also able to change its color temperature using True Tone. According to Greg Joswiak, Apple's vice president of product marketing, the screens Apple used in the iPhone X were made to avoid the oversaturation of colors that are displayed on most OLED panels by adjusting color so that it doesn't look too saturated or very intense

name: MI 10
description: Xiaomi has made a bold move by launching the Mi 10 5G in India. The curved glass on the front and back of this phone looks classy. This, coupled with the high-gloss finish makes it striking to look at. The Mi 10 5G has a 6.67-inch AMOLED screen and is sharp enough, but the resolution is full-HD+ (2340x1080). The display also runs at 90Hz, which is a big trend right now.

name: SAMSUNG GALACY S20+
description: The Samsung Galaxy S20+ is the middle child in the trio and is the successor to the Galaxy S10+. It features a 6.7-inch QHD+ display, with excellent brightness and colours reproduction. The curved sides and glass back gives it a very premiium look and feel. It also supports wireless charging and is IP68 certified for dust and water resistance.

name: ONEPLUS 7T
description: OnePlus has taken a bunch of features from the more expensive OnePlus 7 Pro and put them into the OnePlus 7T, which is the successor to the OnePlus 7. To add to this confusion, the older two models have only been on the market for around four months prior to this launch. While some buyers will love having more features and power, there are others who will be disappointed that this company has raised the price of its base model yet again.

name: OPPO K1
description: Oppo has taken a bunch of features from the more expensive Oppo k1 and put them into the OnePlus 7T, which is the successor to the OnePlus 7. To add to this confusion, the older two models have only been on the market for around four months prior to this launch. While some buyers will love having more features and power, there are others who will be disappointed that this company has raised the price of its base model yet again.

To add to this confusion, the older two models have only been on the market for around four months prior to this launch. While some buyers will love having more features and power, there are others who will be disappointed that this company has raised the price of its base model yet again.

name: BOAR ROCKERS 400
description: The Boat Rockerz 400 is available in four colour options; Carbon Black, Black/ Red, Black/ Blue, and Grey/ Green. The Rockerz 400 has 40mm drivers with 32 Ohms impedance ratings and a frequency response range of 20Hz-20KHz. It has a 250mAh battery and a claimed battery life of 8 hours.

name: MI 18W CHARGER
description: Designed for Mi(Redmi 5A/Redmi note 4/Redmi Note 5/Redmi Note 5 pro), OPPO(F3/F3 Plus/F7), Samsung galaxy(J3 pro/On Nxt/On5), Infinix(hot 4 Pro/Note 4/), Lava( A52), Asus (Zenfone/Zenfone 3_max), Samsung Guru Music 2, Honor( 7A/9/9 lite/ Holloy 3), Micromax (Spark 4g), VIVO(V9/V9 Plus), iVooMi I2, Motorola Moto( E4 plus/G5s/G6 Play), Yu(Yunique 2 /2 Plus)

name: TEMPERED GLASS
description: Hupshy Full Tempered Glass Screen Protector is designed to perfectly fit to your Realme Narzo 10A smartphone. It has very easy application, leaving no bubbles, and having no glare. Its Oleophobic coating helps reduce visibility of fingerprints and other contaminants, making it easy to quickly clean the screen. Measuring in at just 0.3mm thick, our Premium GLASS Screen Protector is scratch and wear resistant, and also has glare reducing capabilities. Designed to be extremely tough and durable, Installation is also a breeze. Align the screen protector on top of the device, push down on the tempered glass and allow the adhesive to work its magic.

name: CASE COVER
description: Stealth Defence Back Case [With Shock Protection & Built-in Stand] - Matte Black The Stealth Defence Back Case is the best case can get! Its matte black stealth finish is completely black and is stunning. The surface has a special anti-fingerprint coating to avoid fingerprint marks. The Stealth Defence Cover also features double layer of protection for the device. The outer tough polycarbonate layer protects the device from shocks

name: Dell VOSTRO
description: Dell Inspiron 3467 is a Windows 10 Home laptop with a 14.00-inch display that has a resolution of 1366x768 pixels. It is powered by a Core i3 processor and it comes with 4GB of RAM. The Dell Inspiron 3467 packs 1TB of HDD storage.

name: MACBOOK AIR
description: Apple MacBook Air MQD32HN/A is a macOS laptop with a 13.30-inch display that has a resolution of 1440x900 pixels. It is powered by a Core i5 processor and it comes with 8GB of RAM. The Apple MacBook Air MQD32HN/A packs 128GB of SSD storage

name: HP 15Q
description: HP 15Q-DS0029TU is a Windows 10 Home laptop with a 15.60-inch display that has a resolution of 1920x1080 pixels. It is powered by a Core i5 processor and it comes with 8GB of RAM. The HP 15Q-DS0029TU packs 1TB of HDD storage.

name: ACER ASPIRE 7
description: Acer Aspire 7 is a Windows 10 laptop with a 15.60-inch display that has a resolution of 1920x1080 pixels. It is powered by a Core i5 processor and it comes with 16GB of RAM. The Acer Aspire 7 packs 512GB of SSD storage.

name: ASUS VIVOBOOK

Being sweat-proof and splash-proof with an IPX5 rated portable design, itâ€™s ideal for an outdoorsy, active lifestyle.

name: BAG
description: W x H: 14 x 20 inch 30% Extra Storage We Indians tend to carry a lot of stuff in our backpacks, which is why this Billion backpack comes with spacious compartments. Maximised Comfort with Padded, Breathable Back System Its adjustable shoulder straps with padded air mesh and back padding ensure long-lasting comfort while carrying this backpack.
